title: Album Page, "Sketches of Balcony Elements in Chapel, Château de Chenonceau", June 18, 1888
medium: Graphite on off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, upper right corner: 54; lower right corner: 47; clockwise from upper right: Hand Rail / Full Size; Baluster of Balcony in Chapel - / Full Size Chenonceaux / June 18th 1888; Baluster comes here.
description: Vertical sheet illustrating a full scale rendering of the upper section of a balcony balustrade from the chapel at the Château de Chenonceau.  The baluster is drawn at the left side of the sheet, while the molding volume and profile of the handrail supported by the baluster is drawn at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Sketches of Balcony Elements in Chapel, Château de Chenonceau", June 18, 1888.
June 18, 1888. Graphite on off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-220.
